And in the seventh<S>7637</S> month<S>2320</S>, on the first<S>259</S> day of the month<S>2320</S>, ye shall have an holy<S>6944</S> convocation<S>4744</S>; ye shall do<S>6213</S> no servile<S>5656</S> work<S>4399</S>: it is a day<S>3117</S> of blowing<S>8643</S> the trumpets unto you.
And ye shall offer<S>6213</S> a burnt offering<S>5930</S> for a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>; one<S>259</S> young<S>1241</S> bullock<S>6499</S>, one<S>259</S> ram<S>352</S>, and seven<S>7651</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>:
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> shall be of flour<S>5560</S> mingled<S>1101</S> with oil<S>8081</S>, three<S>7969</S> tenth deals<S>6241</S> for a bullock<S>6499</S>, and two<S>8147</S> tenth deals<S>6241</S> for a ram<S>352</S>,
And one<S>259</S> tenth deal<S>6241</S> for one<S>259</S> lamb<S>3532</S>, throughout the seven<S>7651</S> lambs<S>3532</S>:
And one<S>259</S> kid<S>8163</S> of the goats<S>5795</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>, to make an atonement<S>3722</S> for you:
Beside the burnt offering<S>5930</S> of the month<S>2320</S>, and his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and the daily<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and their drink offerings<S>5262</S>, according unto their manner<S>4941</S>, for a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S>, a sacrifice made by fire<S>801</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>.
And ye shall have on the tenth<S>6218</S> day of this seventh<S>7637</S> month<S>2320</S> an holy<S>6944</S> convocation<S>4744</S>; and ye shall afflict<S>6031</S> your souls<S>5315</S>: ye shall not do<S>6213</S> any work<S>4399</S> therein:
But ye shall offer<S>7126</S> a burnt offering<S>5930</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> for a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S>; one<S>259</S> young<S>1241</S> bullock<S>6499</S>, one<S>259</S> ram<S>352</S>, and seven<S>7651</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S>; they shall be unto you without blemish<S>8549</S>:
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> shall be of flour<S>5560</S> mingled<S>1101</S> with oil<S>8081</S>, three<S>7969</S> tenth deals<S>6241</S> to a bullock<S>6499</S>, and two<S>8147</S> tenth deals<S>6241</S> to one<S>259</S> ram<S>352</S>,
A several tenth deal<S>6241</S> for one<S>259</S> lamb<S>3532</S>, throughout the seven<S>7651</S> lambs<S>3532</S>:
One<S>259</S> kid<S>8163</S> of the goats<S>5795</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the sin offering<S>2403</S> of atonement<S>3725</S>, and the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and the meat offering<S>4503</S> of it, and their drink offerings<S>5262</S>.
And on the fifteenth<S>2568</S> <S>6240</S> day<S>3117</S> of the seventh<S>7637</S> month<S>2320</S> ye shall have an holy<S>6944</S> convocation<S>4744</S>; ye shall do<S>6213</S> no servile<S>5656</S> work<S>4399</S>, and ye shall keep<S>2287</S> a feast<S>2282</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> seven<S>7651</S> days<S>3117</S>:
And ye shall offer<S>7126</S> a burnt offering<S>5930</S>, a sacrifice made by fire<S>801</S>, of a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>; thirteen<S>7969</S> <S>6240</S> young<S>1241</S> <S>1121</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>, and fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S>; they shall be without blemish<S>8549</S>:
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> shall be of flour<S>5560</S> mingled<S>1101</S> with oil<S>8081</S>, three<S>7969</S> tenth deals<S>6241</S> unto every<S>259</S> bullock<S>6499</S> of the thirteen<S>7969</S> <S>6240</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> tenth deals<S>6241</S> to each<S>259</S> ram<S>352</S> of the two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>,
And a several tenth deal<S>6241</S> to each<S>259</S> lamb<S>3532</S> of the fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S>:
And one<S>259</S> kid<S>8163</S> of the goats<S>5795</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and his drink offering<S>5262</S>.
And on the second<S>8145</S> day<S>3117</S> ye shall offer twelve<S>8147</S> <S>6240</S> young<S>1121</S> <S>1241</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>, fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without spot<S>8549</S>:
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> and their drink offerings<S>5262</S> for the bullocks<S>6499</S>, for the rams<S>352</S>, and for the lambs<S>3532</S>, shall be according to their number<S>4557</S>, after the manner<S>4941</S>:
And one<S>259</S> kid<S>8163</S> of the goats<S>5795</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and the meat offering<S>4503</S> thereof, and their drink offerings<S>5262</S>.
And on the third<S>7992</S> day<S>3117</S> eleven<S>6249</S> <S>6240</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>, fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>;
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> and their drink offerings<S>5262</S> for the bullocks<S>6499</S>, for the rams<S>352</S>, and for the lambs<S>3532</S>, shall be according to their number<S>4557</S>, after the manner<S>4941</S>:
And one<S>259</S> goat<S>8163</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and his drink offering<S>5262</S>.
And on the fourth<S>7243</S> day<S>3117</S> ten<S>6235</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>, and fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>:
Their meat offering<S>4503</S> and their drink offerings<S>5262</S> for the bullocks<S>6499</S>, for the rams<S>352</S>, and for the lambs<S>3532</S>, shall be according to their number<S>4557</S>, after the manner<S>4941</S>:
And one<S>259</S> kid<S>8163</S> of the goats<S>5795</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and his drink offering<S>5262</S>.
And on the fifth<S>2549</S> day<S>3117</S> nine<S>8672</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>, and fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without spot<S>8549</S>:
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> and their drink offerings<S>5262</S> for the bullocks<S>6499</S>, for the rams<S>352</S>, and for the lambs<S>3532</S>, shall be according to their number<S>4557</S>, after the manner<S>4941</S>:
And one<S>259</S> goat<S>8163</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and his drink offering<S>5262</S>.
And on the sixth<S>8345</S> day<S>3117</S> eight<S>8083</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>, and fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>:
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> and their drink offerings<S>5262</S> for the bullocks<S>6499</S>, for the rams<S>352</S>, and for the lambs<S>3532</S>, shall be according to their number<S>4557</S>, after the manner<S>4941</S>:
And one<S>259</S> goat<S>8163</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and his drink offering<S>5262</S>.
And on the seventh<S>7637</S> day<S>3117</S> seven<S>7651</S> bullocks<S>6499</S>, two<S>8147</S> rams<S>352</S>, and fourteen<S>702</S> <S>6240</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>:
And their meat offering<S>4503</S> and their drink offerings<S>5262</S> for the bullocks<S>6499</S>, for the rams<S>352</S>, and for the lambs<S>3532</S>, shall be according to their number<S>4557</S>, after the manner<S>4941</S>:
And one<S>259</S> goat<S>8163</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and his drink offering<S>5262</S>.
On the eighth<S>8066</S> day<S>3117</S> ye shall have a solemn assembly<S>6116</S>: ye shall do<S>6213</S> no servile<S>5656</S> work<S>4399</S> therein:
But ye shall offer<S>7126</S> a burnt offering<S>5930</S>, a sacrifice made by fire<S>801</S>, of a sweet<S>5207</S> savour<S>7381</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S>: one<S>259</S> bullock<S>6499</S>, one<S>259</S> ram<S>352</S>, seven<S>7651</S> lambs<S>3532</S> of the first<S>1121</S> year<S>8141</S> without blemish<S>8549</S>:
Their meat offering<S>4503</S> and their drink offerings<S>5262</S> for the bullock<S>6499</S>, for the ram<S>352</S>, and for the lambs<S>3532</S>, shall be according to their number<S>4557</S>, after the manner<S>4941</S>:
And one<S>259</S> goat<S>8163</S> for a sin offering<S>2403</S>; beside the continual<S>8548</S> burnt offering<S>5930</S>, and his meat offering<S>4503</S>, and his drink offering<S>5262</S>.
These things ye shall do<S>6213</S> unto the LORD<S>3068</S> in your set feasts<S>4150</S>, beside your vows<S>5088</S>, and your freewill offerings<S>5071</S>, for your burnt offerings<S>5930</S>, and for your meat offerings<S>4503</S>, and for your drink offerings<S>5262</S>, and for your peace offerings<S>8002</S>. <sup>do: or, offer</sup>
And Moses<S>4872</S> told<S>559</S> the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> according to all that the LORD<S>3068</S> commanded<S>6680</S> Moses<S>4872</S>.
